channel.title: half life 1.0.0.9 - 1.0.1.6
channel.description:
I've been trying to play an old half life mod called Rebellion (a french mod, pretty great mod). The problem is, it works only with an old half life version, from v1.0.0.9 to v1.0.1.6 . I still have my old half life cd (which means no steam), but I can't find any of the old patches, all the links I found are dead! I've been searching all day it's driving me crazy:fffuuu:
Does anyone know where I can find an old patch (any version from 1.0.0.9 to 1.0.1.6 would do)?

item.title: half life 1.0.0.9 - 1.0.1.6
item.dc:creator: Xuri
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

Where did you find the mod?

Is your half life associated to a steam account?

EdIt: Found a post that might help

I’m gonna try that
Thanks for the answer.

EDIT: doesn’t work
When I start a new game, the loading screen appears but then nothing happens

EDIT2: I got it!
I just realized that the 1.0.1.5 patch is in the opposing force cd (lucky I still have it).
It works now

Read full topic

item.title: half life 1.0.0.9 - 1.0.1.6
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Where did you find the mod?

Is your half life associated to a steam account?

EdIt: Found a post that might help

captainFill Says:
25 March 2010 at 9:35 am
In case you have version half-life 1.1.1.0 like me, all you have to do to make this mod to work is to go in folder rebellion, open liblist.gam with notepad and change “dlls\rebellion.dll” to “…\valve\dlls\hl.dll”

Read full topic
